new_object.custom_pid_description:
If necessary, you can choose a custom PID of the form uuid:xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx.
The PID must not be assigned to another object.

urnnbn.title: URN:NBN Registration
urnnbn.message: The action registers selected digital objects in the resolver and assigns the URN:NNB identifier to the objects.
urnnbn.note1: The action goes through connected objects too.
urnnbn.note2: Use only for fully described objects.

help.1: you can activate or deactivate the block by clicking on the block in the right control panel
help.2: active blocks are marked in green, inactive in red
help.3: the current layout of the individual blocks can be seen in the lower preview
help.4: you can resize individual blocks horizontally and vertically
help.5: you can then assign the type you want to display to the individual blocks
